name: Jordan Ellis
persona: Jordan Ellis is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, as reflected by a very low CGPA. Jordan finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often putting off assignments and lacking confidence in their academic abilities. While test anxiety is not a significant issue, Jordan's low perseverance and self-discipline have made it difficult to improve grades. Despite these setbacks, Jordan hopes to find renewed motivation and support to turn their academic journey around.
